author: FireAndRescueAcademy
description: Comprehensive member management system for Fire & Rescue Academy alliance. Tracks Discord and MissionChief data, notes, infractions, contribution rates, and provides automated monitoring.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing MemberManager!

This cog integrates with:
- MemberSync (for Discord â†” MC linking)
- AllianceScraper (for MC member data)
- Red's modlog (for Discord infractions)

Use `[p]member help` to get started.

Recommended setup:
1. Configure admin roles: `[p]memberset adminroles`
2. Set alert channel: `[p]memberset alertchannel`
3. Enable automation: `[p]memberset autocontribution on`

For full documentation, see the README.
short: Member management with notes, infractions, and automation
name: MemberManager
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores member information including Discord IDs, MissionChief IDs, notes, infractions, and audit trails. Data can be deleted upon user request.
